title: (x) Intercultura - Bodoni {Yves}
content:
Hi, who knows the type of "Intercultura", italian AFS association?   
thanks a lot!   
   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121133811im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/49469.gif)

 [‹ font used by Paula Scher](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121133811/http:/www.typophile.com/node/6713 "Go to previous forum topic") [Stagga Lee cd font ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121133811/http:/www.typophile.com/node/6789 "Go to next forum topic")
author: franzlt

comments.content: Bodoni, but don't ask me which one, no time to go hunting.
Looks like plain old [Bodoni Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121133811/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/bodoni/bold/testdrive.html?s=Intercultura&p=48) to me.
